title: Twitter Discloses New Executive Chairman Kordestani’s Pay
text:
Twitter on Friday disclosed the pay package for its newly-appointed executive chairman and former Google executive Omid Kordestani.
The social-media company named Mr. Kordestani to the post Wednesday after last week appointing co-founder Jack Dorsey as its permanent chief executive.
